body: Betumi explains how to make iced kenkey: "Iced kenkey" is quick and easy to make. It is a popular inexpensive snack/street food sold throughout much of Ghana. It can tide people over until they can have a more filling meal. Iced kenkey is also used as a weaning food for children."
original_body: Betumi explains how to make iced kenkey: "Iced kenkey" is quick and easy to make. It is a popular inexpensive snack/street food sold throughout much of Ghana. It can tide people over until they can have a more filling meal. Iced kenkey is also used as a weaning food for children."
title: Ghana: Learn How to Make Iced Kenkey

sentence: Betumi explains how to make iced kenkey: "Iced kenkey" is quick and easy to make.
It is a popular inexpensive snack/street food sold throughout much of Ghana.
It can tide people over until they can have a more filling meal.
Iced kenkey is also used as a weaning food for children."
